content: What if a publisher handed you a contract to write any book of your choice? What would you write about?
What if you could master any skill instantly? What would you choose to learn?
What if you could sit down with any historical figure for dinner? Who would you pick and what would you ask?
What if you could teach the world something that comes from yourself? What would you teach?
What if you could give your 10-year-old self one piece of advice? What would it be?
What if you could unlearn one belief that has shaped how you see the world? What would it be?
What if you could know the answer to one unsolved mystery? Which would you choose?
What if you had the courage to ask your closest friend one question you never dared to ask? What would you ask?
What if you could finally admit something you've been denying to yourself? What would it be?
What if you could hear what people really think when they give you advice? Whose honest opinion would you want most?
